str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Wisdom, insight, skill (human or divine), intelligence. From sophos; wisdom.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
From hagiazo; properly, purification, i.e. purity; concretely a purifier.
From a compound of apo and lutron; ransom in full, i.e. riddance, or Christian salvation.
